items.question: Is there a minimum contract period?
items.answer: No, EasyTakt is a month-to-month service. You can cancel at any time without any penalties.

items.question: Are there any setup fees?
items.answer: None at all. The monthly fee covers everything, including setup and onboarding support.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept all major credit cards and can provide invoices for bank transfers within the EU.

items.question: Can I change plans later?
items.answer: We offer a single comprehensive plan that includes all features. No need to worry about upgrading or downgrading.
